message: Halverson cited a 2017 study from the American Journal of Public Health which "Found that girls who were sexually abused as children were 2.5 times more likely to be sex trafficked, but for boys their risk factor of being sex trafficked was over eight times greater if they had been sexually abused."

data.description: Organizations call attention to the lack of resources available to male sex abuse and trafficking victims.
data.title: Advocates Raise Awareness about the Hidden and Ignored Suffering of Male Sex Trafficking Victims
